hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
